getSubjectNameIDValue

public String getSubjectNameIDValue()
Return the value of the /Subject/NameID element in an assertion

Returns:
The value. null, if the assertion does not contain the element.

checkRecipient

public boolean checkRecipient(String assertionConsumerURL)
Check whether an assertion contains an assertionConsumerURL within a subjectConfirmationData having the subjectConfirmationMethod=urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:cm:bearer

Returns:
true, if the assertion contains the assertionConsumerURL. false otherwise.

getConfirmationTime

public org.joda.time.DateTime getConfirmationTime()

getSessionIndex

public String getSessionIndex()
Return the value of the /AuthnStatement@SessionIndex element in an assertion

Returns:
The value. null, if the assertion does not contain the element.

hasSessionExpired

public boolean hasSessionExpired()
Check whether an assertion contains an expired sessionIndex within a AuthnStatement (i.e. AuthnStatement@SessionNotOnOrAfter >= now)

Returns:
true, if the assertion has expired. false otherwise.

getAuthnContextClassRef

public String getAuthnContextClassRef()
Return the value of the /AuthnStatement/AuthnContext/AuthnContextClassRef element in an assertion

Returns:
The value. null, if the assertion does not contain the element.

validateAssertion

public void validateAssertion(AssertionValidator validator,
                              String spEntityID,
                              String spAssertionConsumerURL)
                       throws ValidationException
Validate whether a SAML assertion contains the expected elements

Parameters:
validator - The validator to use forassertion validation. Can be null.
spEntityID - The entityID of the service provider
spAssertionConsumerURL - The assertion consumer URL of the service provider
Throws:
ValidationException
